patthana8.9:1.1_0: Nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.9:1.1_1: Nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.9:1.1_2: Nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano ca naanidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.9:2.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
